attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The country is in a mess with both parents and their children thinking  working for a living is not neccassary.Teachers should have the right to discipline children without fear of being sued or assaulted by parents.Grammar schools should be re-introduced along with vocational training (apprenticeships)Not every youngster is capable of completing degree courses.A joy rider is a thief Happy slapping is assault.If a burglar breaks into your house and is injured tough, they had no right to be there.Landlords should be trained to know when someone has had enough to drink and not sell them any more alcohol.Drug addicts should be forced to go cold turkey without the right to sue.If people living on benefits turn down two offers of work benefits should be withheld.The police should be allowed to get on with there job without fear of being sued.National service and borstals should be re-introduced to instill RESPECT.
We the undersigned have had enough of the "Nanny State" and are calling on the goverment for radical change before it is too late and the coutry sinks even deeper into depravity

rejection.details: The title should be a request for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
